website_summaries.verdict: The antibiotic-free, vegetarian fed chickens in this high quality food come from small family farms in North Carolina.
pros: Contains appetizing ingredients like lentils, sweet potatoes, and blueberries
Some found it worked as well as a prescription food at a fraction of the cost — 8 lbs
Also comes in pork, beef, duck and turkey, as well as chicken and turkey version that contains grain
cons: Some humans were not fond of the look or smell

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: I believe honest kitchen is the way to go, if you are thinking of going with a dehydrated food. It’s just better quality. My reason for buying spot farms food, is because my dog just isn’t a fan of honest kitchen food. She does prefer this food way more. I’m not saying spot farms dehydrated is a bad food. It’s not. This food does tend to absorb moisture very quickly, and thickens up like concrete. I have to add more water, than what is recommended, just to try and avoid it from thickening so much.
customer_reviews.author: R.L. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Stick with Honest Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This food is in no way comparable to Honest Kitchen Food. I should have paid better attention to the ingredients. Potatoes are the second ingredient. It has the texture of flour and it's sticky. Honest Kitchen is like cornmeal. Spot Farms thickens almost immediately. It gets too thick too fast. It was a pain waiting three minutes for Honest Kitchen Food to thicken up, but I was almost afraid Spot Farms was going to turn into cement. I believe Honest Kitchen is a far superior product, but it's expensive, so I tried the Spot Farms. My dogs ate it fine, but I don't have confidence in the product. I will pay the extra money for Honest Kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Good

customer_reviews.title: Great "gravy" to ensure nutrients
customer_reviews.text: We use this to guarantee our three very different dogs stay interested in eating their food while maintaining weight in a older female and dropping weight in an obese golden, The girls love their food and have had great results. In turn, their brother seems to be gaining weight on this product since he LOVES his food for the first time ever. We use this to make sure their breakfast is eaten when it is served as well as their supplements, at night they eat dry food and green beans so it is extra important that they get the nutrients they need from the supplement. We have been pleased with decreased shedding and increased interest in food.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi’s Giants

customer_reviews.title: The best food I've found
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog food I've found. My dog loves it like bacon loves it. My dog has had gas as long as I've had her and it didn't seem to matter what dog food I feed her. It stopped after I put her on this food. One large box of this food fits perfectly into a 2.5-gallon jar. I'm using these from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Anony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is a picky eater and we've struggled finding foods she'll eat. We've had good success with all of the Spot Farms dehydrated foods. Yes, it's basically a paste, but we mix roughly 50/50 with standard solid dog food and it goes over well. The ingredient list is sound and probably better than 90% of Americans eat (no high fructose corn syrup or artificial flavors, etc). Overall, we're happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: UWP98

customer_reviews.title: I let the dogs vote
customer_reviews.text: And it was a 4 paws up on this product. Every dog in my house cleaned their bowls with this food. It quickly hydrated, smelled good, and I would buy it again. The only negative was the resealable bag - yeah, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: DB Mackonis

customer_reviews.title: Been using for years and my dogs like it...
customer_reviews.text: but they prefer the duck and it has been out of stock for months, months now. I use it as a topper and add all sorts of other ridiculousness to all my dogs meals because they are spoiled rotten fur blurps. LOL It is good as a topper, not sure it is a balanced meal though and haven't taken the time to look into it since they get everything else under the sun and eat without complaints (except they want DUCK!) A little disappointed in customer service at Spot Farms. I emailed several months ago about duck and they responded that they would look into production and let me know and I'm still waiting.....
customer_reviews.author: Avidreader

customer_reviews.title: GOOP !
customer_reviews.text: I have literally tried 100s of diff food for my 2 beagles This is the worst ever..she does it..but I refuse to ever buy again..it totally has the texture of gooey paste U can't see any ingredients..its complete ..SLIME..you know that green slime kids play with ? With NO exaggeration..NO lying. This food has the exact look and texture..smells gross too. Will never ever buy again !!
customer_reviews.author: Dawndy12

customer_reviews.title: Dog enjoys this
customer_reviews.text: My dog always has kibble in a bowl as she doesn't overeat at all, and I give her a small bowl of this every evening because she likes it so much. If I feed her too much she eats it too quickly and throws up, so I just give her a couple scoops (probably a quarter-half cup, dried, mixed into a small bowl of warm water) and she has no problems other than some drips in her beard sometimes (terrier!). She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: YES

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive picky Shiba Inu!
customer_reviews.text: The Shiba Inu loves it! One of the very few foods he doesn’t vomit. Stools not too hard or too soft. He also doesn’t eat his own poop when he eats this food. Wish it were cheaper because I work for a competitor company and can get their brand at half this price for twice the amount :( I’m not made of money, but if I were this would be my choice of dog food EVERY TIME!
customer_reviews.author: Bandycat

customer_reviews.title: Happy, pleased, customer
customer_reviews.text: We feel very comfortable giving our adult malinois this food. We had always been grain free feeders. But since we found this human grade food made from real chicken we were sold. After being on this food for 1 month we could tell a difference in her hair, her weight, her teeth. She just glows. We really appreciate Spot Farms for going the distance for our loved ones. That love it.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Clem

customer_reviews.title: The best dehydrated quality food at a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large dog that was having trouble with hard kibble. Soft canned food is out of the question based on price. I was driving across country with my dog and wanted something portable and practical. I researched every dehydrated food and weeded all the negatively reviewed brands. I ordered the turkey version. I even ate a bite (it IS human grade). KInda bland, but my dog LOVES it. She inhales it and begs for more. Just add water. You can see small chunks of the ingredients. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Sadie won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: From the start my little Sadie didn't really like the flavor. I started mixing with other foods that she likes. That helped for about 4 weeks. However as time passed she started "sneaking" up on her food and very carefully sniff. I don't know what that was about unless she was afraid it might jump out at her. I then started using less and less, however she was still reluctant to eat it. I quit putting it in her food and she was back to happily eating her food. I ended up giving to the friend who recommended this because her dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my picky eater and her fur too
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty picky chihuahua who eats this food consistently. Even after a year and half. I've also noticed that since she's been eating the grain free turkey recipe for several months now that the patch of hair on her chest that I assumed was gone forever has started to grow back. Overall, I'm impressed with the food. She's 5.5 lbs, eats 1/4 c twice a day, and a 3.5 lb box lasts us a month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, great quality and my dogs like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a healthy alternative to kibble and canned. I tried the refriderated foods that are available at pet stores and supermarkets, but the price continued to rise on those and i was not convinced the quality was as good as I wanted. I have been cooking fresh food for my dogs for several months but often that is not practical. This food is a great solution for flexibility and quality, as it does not need refrigeration and travels very nicely. Also my dogs who have been used to eating fresh food like this food almost as much as fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New to the clean bowl committee!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food, and their stomachs tolerated it very well. I switched to this when another similar, dehydrated dog food became too expensive to feed two large, energy-burning huskies. I thought I was going to be slightly down-grading by switching, but I was very wrong. This brand appears to contain a larger percentage of meat than other brands, and I like the way it mixes up better. The key review, however, is in the spotless, shiny bowls that are left after dinner time!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has been experiencing some health issues lately. We wanted to switch him over from the basic canned wet foods that we feed him to something more high end to help with his mega-esophagus issues. We decided to try out three high end wet dog food off of Amazon: Dapper Dog Cuisine, Spot Farms, The Honest Kitchen. He loved all three, and we feel that THK ingredients are the highest quality. However THK prices are just way to expensive for our taste and we feel Spot Farms and DDC were at a much better price point while only being slightly less in the ingredient area. We highly recommend Spot!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: My picky dog didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping with all the great reviews that my dog would eat this food. She sniffed and walked away. She was raised on people food. We adopted her last year and it's been a real struggle. She eats a little of the Beneful style prepared meals so I was hopeful she would like this since it's human grade food. I'm now stuck with this food that she won't eat :(
customer_reviews.author: Flynnsreview

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this twice now. I bought it initially because my dogs didn’t want to eat their other kibble dog food. They LOVE this food. I also bought it for my mom’s dog. I mix kibble and this food to make it stretch a little farther.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food!
customer_reviews.text: This cleared up my dog’s digestive system problems. I use this strictly as an almost daily topper; approximately half cup (dry) mixed well into my dog’s kibble after rehydration. The dogs love it & it lasts quite awhile that way with 2 dogs. It will turn a mediocre kibble into a high quality one in my opinion. One of the dogs had lots of constipation issues & gas & changing kibble did not help. This food completely changed that after years of dealing with it. The reasons I don’t use this as the sole food is bcuz it’d be too expensive with my large dogs & bcuz kibble helps clean their teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Daywalker

customer_reviews.title: full of potatoes and legumes that are linked to DCM in dogs
customer_reviews.text: The company refuses to answer questions regarding quality controls, the food has both potatoes and lentils which are linked to Dilated cardiomyopathy in dogs (it’s almost always fatal) and the food does not meet WSAVA (world small animal veterinary association) guidelines. I will no longer buy this food as I have lost faith in the company.
customer_reviews.author: Kris D

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved that product and gave it to my dog since he was 8 weeks old and he loved it too. After a year he stopped eating it. I contacted the customer support and got a refund...really great customer service. I switched to a different flavor (turkey) and he loved it. BUT he stopped eating it after a half year. That's why I only can give 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kong stuffing
customer_reviews.text: This product has quality ingredients that are responsibly sourced.... but is quite expensive for a large dog. I use it to stuff Kongs (which I then freeze) and give to my pup. It really works awesome that way. I love it because I know I am not feeding him junk as his snack and he has something a little different. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: RaleighBells

customer_reviews.title: Better than what most humans eat daily, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I currently go through about 1.5 boxes a month. My two Boston Terriers really love this food. They seem to have great energy and really shiny coats. However, I have noticed that the sweet potato pieces never really get soft enough for them to digest, because I see them in their poop. I have even used boiling water and let it sit for 5+ minutes to see if that would make a different but those pieces of potato just never get soft, which is why I think they can't digest them. I think Spot Farms could grind these up smaller so that the water could soften them up, then I would give 5 stars for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Derek D.

customer_reviews.title: dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: i have 6 dogs that are on a raw diet. i bought this product for when we take them hiking/camping. the dogs really enjoy it and have absolutely no gastrointestinal changes or distress from switching their food...unlike with kibble!!!
customer_reviews.author: sam enewold

customer_reviews.title: Why always out of stock?!?!
customer_reviews.text: We do subscribe and save...monthly...My dog loves this product but it’s always out of stock!!! Ugh! Changing my dogs food is not easy...please do something to keep this in stock! Help me understand why??? Do I need to permanently move him to another good? I can’t switch back and forth with his allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this product and the ingredients are amazing
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this product and the ingredients are amazing. I wish I could use it as their only food source, but I am a rescue and can't manage it as a single food for them. I will continue to use it along with another food product because I know that even a little added to their diet is better then none at all. Thank you for such an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Froggatt

customer_reviews.title: Great price per oz! But...
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer the whole grain as it's been known for quite a while that grain-free is causing heart problems with dogs so I put in a tsp of pre-cooked oatmeal/barley with ea. serving. ( Pre-cook a cups worth & keep in fridge) Small dogs love it but notice their breath smells like the food for hours after? I will say it is a fantastic price per ounce versus another popular brand of dehydrated food. And Mom approved ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this food! In just 2 days she recognized the box and is super excited for this food. I have been feeding her Merrick grain-free puppy food and supplementing with one feeding of Spot Farms although we will be transitioning to only Spot Farms in the next week. The consistency is a bit thick and a little difficult for her to get out of her bowl but it slows her eating down so she has less hiccups. It also seems to be helping with the amount of waste she is producing.
customer_reviews.author: acw120404

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. It's easy to make and easy to store. It doesn't take up much room in my RV when I take my dogs on a trip. I just ad the food to a plastic zip bag and it will fit just about anywhere. It is much easier than trying to use canned food and so much better for my puppies. They really look forward to eating since I have started this food.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: No taste+ no smell=no reason to eat it
customer_reviews.text: I think the consistency is poor, too soupy even after adding more to the water. My dog won't eat it. It does not have a smell or taste, yes I tasted it. There's nothing here to attract him to it. I wasted my money unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Tcc

customer_reviews.title: Natural products
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a mass on her gum line. She alstlost a few teeth in the process. Dr said soft food only, so I started looking at soft food on Amazon that was soft as well as good for her. Decided to try this based on the ingredients. It looks awfully like “slop” but she gobbled it up. I went and bought each flavor to try. She loved them all. Score!
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the first box of Spot Farms last year while on vacation last summer and found it to be a good "thickener" for the Honest Kitchen products we use. Our dogs liked it so much that we continued ordering it and now have it on auto-delivery. While we have one dog who'd eat anything (and, sadly, he does!), even our finicky hound likes Spot Farms.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bogden

customer_reviews.title: Convenient high quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a fearful dog and am very careful how I feed him. I don't want food to add to his stress. I mix it with many different raw meats, eggs, yogurt, cottage cheese, organs, raw meaty bones (cooked bones are dangerous), raw eggs & other high quality raw dried foods. He loves meal time. He gets a very varied diet so he has great gut biome. This is my most usual base.
customer_reviews.author: DRP

customer_reviews.title: Best we have used.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love. My boxer eats this as a supplement to her dry food. She scarfs this down and begs for more. It’s easy to make. No tummy issues or gas problems with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality, my dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Spot Farms Human Grade Dog Food is totally awesome. My dogs absolutely love it, and it lasts forever. Plus, if you're trapped under something heavy and the only things you can reach are Spot Farms Dog Food, and a bottle of water, you can eat the dog food and survive until someone comes to your rescue! It's a win-win! Their tag line should be something like, Spot Farms Human Grade Dog Food - The go-to dog food for everyday life, AND the apocalypse.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bowler

customer_reviews.title: less fat for my 4 dogs
customer_reviews.text: All of my dogs have trimmed down and our Vet is very impressed with their lean body. Maybe I should start eating this food.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Main

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients shown here are not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically chose turkey grain free based on ingredients shown here as not including legumes. My dog will not eat legumes. We currently have the duck formula, which has red lentils, my mistake for not checking. He won't eat it. Now I have another box that was supposed to be lentil(legume) free. Which of the formulas are REALLY free of legumes, and do the ingredients vary by batch without notice? How do we know what we purchase is what we will receive? Very disappointed. Instant refund from Amazon, so, there's that for the one star.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this food. I like how you can mix it for different consistencies. He's been on it for 3 months . We had to transition slowly due to some diarrhea at first but my guy has a sensitive stomach anyways. He's about 60+ lbs and 2 boxes lasted for about a month sometimes a little over. Only reason I'm returning is he has been disgnosed with kidney disease and need to change his food.
customer_reviews.author: stacy stewart

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for a pork based dehydrated dog food. This was perfect as pork is the single source of meat; important when you are dealing with allergy prone dogs. Food mixes up easily and all the dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food, and it's easier for me to feed when I'm not feeling well versus making my own. The price is reasonable, too. They're doing perfectly fine on it so I continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ottaviano

customer_reviews.title: Wolf-down worthy!
customer_reviews.text: My pups crowded around me while I opened the box and could not be any more excited to try it and clean their plates! They have all been burned out on their old food and I am so glad to have found your food! They love it, so I love it
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: For his dinner meal, I mix in about 3/4 cup of this with cold or hot water (depending on time of the year), let it sit to thicken up, then stir it in with a 1.5 cups of his dry food. Our dog was 140+ lbs when we first got him. He has lost 50 lbs with this food and exercise. Has great coat and lots of energy. The only downside is his poop smells awful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Terrible gas and burping!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog typically eats another dehydrated, human-grade, grain-free dog food so we are used to prepping & serving this type of food. We gave this brand a try and our dog began to pass terrible, smelly gas and burp neither of which we'd had trouble with before. Switched back to the original food and the issues went away. Not sure what is in this food that caused the issue as the ingredients between the 2 look very similar but we switch back to the other food 4 days later and the issues went away immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressed!
customer_reviews.text: It is the latest craze in dog nutrition so I had to try it. The first speeding I gave a very small amount the dogs loved it but it's surely upset their stomachs the next day and they didn't eat for 2 days after that so now I'm discontinued use.
customer_reviews.author: larger

customer_reviews.title: My senior fur baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My collie is a senior now and very particular about what she likes. She enjoys this very much and seems to give her a bit of extra pep in her step!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Poitra

customer_reviews.title: Chubbs approve of this dog food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was never a fan of kibble, you can see it on his face. I purchased a sample box of dog food, and two dehydrated dog food were included. We've never looked back since. Everyday, for months now, he'd licks the bowl clean. It definitely has a nice aroma, even by human standards. It's a win-win for the humans, per pound it's a little bit cheaper than the fancy kibble I was buying and he doesn't waste any of it. However he prefers turkey and chicken versus the other meats.
customer_reviews.author: J. Riem

customer_reviews.title: Dog looks healthy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. He looks healthy and glowy, is active and not sluggish. Not to mention, its nice to take with me, easy to make. Good food, great Company!!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well
customer_reviews.text: i like the consistency of this product for my older dog. Also can use cold water and mixes well! Wish they made an organic product.....that would be awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Human Grade
customer_reviews.text: This is really quality food and my dogs love me for feeding it to them. I hope you all know the difference between human grade and feed grade, and this is one of the few human grade foods on the market. It is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Katie A

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product on so many levels. The best is how good it is for my dogs and they love it. Other things I really like is no more cans, so less waste. I can store it easily and it's quick to prepare.
customer_reviews.author: Hikingphotobug

customer_reviews.title: great for picky dogs but has potatoes
customer_reviews.text: great dog food! my picky dogs don't pick at their food with this in the bowls. only 4 stars b/c it has potatoes. when i purchased i didn't notice that ingredient on the list. wish they would make this w/o the added starch
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this so much!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously they really love it! Great product at a great price. No stomach upset from any of my 4 dogs with the switch either. I mix it a little on the thin side so that they get some added hydration since it's hot in Arizona and the summer is about to start.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great as frozen Kong filling with few kibbles
customer_reviews.text: Our 80 lb shepsky likes this a lot. She won’t go crazy like some of other food with stronger smell but she will eat well. It also seems to work well with her digestion. We’ve discovered we can make it wet and freeze in a Kong, throw in few kibbles, which will rattle like a toy while she licks her Kong and the content melts. It occupies her quite a bit, better than most bully sticks. So we are happy, despite the powder doesn’t expand as well as advertised, nothing close to making 32lb, more like 16, to make the mix clumpy enough to be appetizing.
customer_reviews.author: eunbook

customer_reviews.title: Gruel - but according to Minnie - tasty
customer_reviews.text: Daily supper for my Bernese Mt. Dog for past 2 years and probably the highlight of her day - she loves it; it’s easy on her system and is a break from her morning kibble. Yes you have to mix with water and it’s a bit of ‘art’ getting the ratio of water to mix perfected but really not a biggie, I’m very satisfied with the product, story and ingredients - it is however more difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: JJL

customer_reviews.title: My picky pups love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 super picky chihuahuas and they love this food! The 3.5 lb box goes a long way! I can also say they prefer the texture of the grain free version there is also one with grains. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Something does not agree in this pasty mess
customer_reviews.text: Made up product as directed dogs very reluctant to touch which is strange as they are eager to try new food when they did try they thre it up almost immediately it makes up into a very pasty glue-like form must be the potatoes afraid to try anymore obviously there is something not agreeing with their systems I have two 15 lb dogs a shi-poo and shichon
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn’t have teeth, so this has been really easy for him to eat. I just add warm water, wait for it to “cook” and then he eats it! Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: The best ever. My beagle has lost 15 pounds on ...
customer_reviews.text: The best ever. My beagle has lost 15 pounds on this diet and looks the best ever. She gets plenty to eat as well. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Dog won’t eat it
customer_reviews.text: Dog just won’t eat this. The texture is odd, it becomes mash potatoey but also a weird gelatinous texture. Some other brands have chunks this is simply a powder. I can’t really blame her for not liking it. It’s not very appealing. I tried mixing a small amount with kibble. It by itself. Mix it with peanut butter... she eats a little but I won’t be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Jokat110

customer_reviews.title: Our picky dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: We have a rescue German Shepherd who is incredibly finicky. She will eat this every day without fail. Other foods like expensive can food doesn’t do it for her. I’ve stopped looking for food to make her happy. This also makes ME happy. Great, sustainable food.
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaRN

customer_reviews.title: Package damaged!!!
customer_reviews.text: The outside box looked fine, but inside - the product was not sealed... and one whole corner was wet and damaged. It’s the first time I’ve ever ver had an issue with a Spot Farms order. The plastic bag inside the box was sealed, so it’s fine, but did want to report this.
customer_reviews.author: L Churchill

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 piglets and 3 fussies. Everyone LOVES ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 piglets and 3 fussies. Everyone LOVES this food. Also it really helped my pup with a skin condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lor LC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog food
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pomchi that has a collapsing trachea. I buy this kind of food for him. I can make it as runny as I want. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Finally Something He Will Eat!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy was a very picky eater. Tried 3 or 4 different dog foods over time and had to mix in homemade food to get him to eat. That was time consuming. Then found this. So easy to prepare and had the same ingredients I was using and taking hours a week to make. He loves it and licks his bowl clean everyday!! Coat is shinier and less scratching. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love this food!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this food. I like the fact that it’s dehydrated so all the vitamins and nutrients aren’t cooked out of it like most dog foods are. I like all the different flavors it comes in. It will give my dog a variety. I love that the business is family owned and operated. Spot farms has got nothing but high-grade food that goes into the makings of it. It’s naturally dehydrated. The only thing that I don’t like is that it’s a little more expensive than other foods but well worth it when you think of the quality of food for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Llskala1024

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😊
customer_reviews.text: I have a little chihuahua who turns her nose up at almost everything. She’s so diff to feed. I got this on a whim because I liked the company’s philosophy. The great news is Polly likes it and my two other not so hard to please love it. Happy when a great company can make quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: I'd give this 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find dog food that doesn't contain rosemary or other herbals to which I am allergic . My dog also has allergies, so I needed to find a quality food that doesn't have chicken, beef, alfalfa, corn and other allergens. This duck based dehydrated dog food is amazing! I always prepare it according to the directions, and usually add in a few extra veggies. My dog loves it and so do I. It's definitely worth the price to keep us both happy, healthy and allergy free!
customer_reviews.author: C. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Cat even tries to bury it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs will eat anything until I have them this. Even my cat has tried to bury the bowl by scratching at it like it’s in her litter box!! I have no idea why this reaction to this food but they obviously know something I don’t!! I spent over $20 on it and now I’m afraid to give it to them.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy to find this type of dog food. Our boys -- all 6 of them -- can be picky eaters. We were looking for alternative quality food that would be easy and quick to prepare when our days were "full". While they will eat it occasionally, we cannot use it more than once or twice a week. It is easy to prepare when the water is boiled and then added to the powder / food.
customer_reviews.author: nunya 2Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. It is easy to mix. I only give this to them as a mini meal after we eat our dinner. They are always looking forward to it and prancing arond. Good stuff, love the pork mix!
customer_reviews.author: J. Robison

customer_reviews.title: Where is my dog food?
customer_reviews.text: Even though the tracking information states, "handed off to Elaine ", this didn't happen and I have only one meal left. HELP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Diehl Postma

customer_reviews.title: Senior dog refuses to eat
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate it for a couple of weeks but now refuses to. I mix it with her kibble but she refuses to eat it, and just wants her kibble. I switched to this food because she has only a couple teeth left and struggles to eat kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE DEHYDRATED DOG FOODS
customer_reviews.text: My dog literally barks and gets excited when he sees me making this food for him. HE LOVES IT!!! 1 positive result is that this food makes his poop easy to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Dads play list

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! This dehydrated food is easy, doesn’t smell funny, and the dog gets to remain pampered. I make a batch every other day as directed and it’s perfect for my little doggo. Mixed looks exactly like an expensive brand. This is the good stuff, I was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bond

customer_reviews.title: Better then the other brand to mix
customer_reviews.text: This is easier to mix then the other dehydrated dog food I was buying.dog seems to like it better too.
customer_reviews.author: Charmian M Inman

customer_reviews.title: Gave my dogs gas and runny stool
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product....I used to use Honest Kitchen dehydrated food but decided to switch because this cheaper. Well, all my dogs got was runny stool and horrid gas. Im not sure if it was just a bad batch or something else. This isnt the product for me.
customer_reviews.author: martabelya

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like the food but...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this dog food. I usually use a similar brand with a higher price, but same concept of the dehydrated food just add water. Anyways, since using this food, my dog will not stop itching and scratching himself. I thought at first maybe he needed a bath, but that was not it. He is sensitive to food allergies. I can't figure out what in this food is causing him to itch. So bummed since I have a ton of the food left. What a waste of food and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it. They used to eat The Honest Kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. They used to eat The Honest Kitchen brand foods but this was a much cheaper option for a grain free food so we gave it a shot. It has a weird texture in my opinion, but the dogs don't mind, so we're good!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully a good nutritional supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have five dogs; too expensive to feed to all. continued feeding to the oldest with health issues. He seemed to like the flavor added to his regular dog food. Hoping it provides additional nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great quality food for my pups
customer_reviews.text: My pups love this food. I usually give them some for breakfast and then add in as a mixer with their dinner. Pups are always excited for it and have never had any issues digesting it. It lasts a long time in the size pack I get, so I am going on my third Subscribe & Save now.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey M.

customer_reviews.title: Lulu loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The Belle loves this! I use it as a topper for her dinner. There is so much food in here! The product mixes fairly easily and thickens when it's left standing for awhile. The only thing that bothers me is that the seal on the package doesn't work. Instead, I fold the top of the bag a couple of times and use a binder clip to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent add to food
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the texture to mix with the other foods I feed my four legged kids. It’s the best. Makes it nice and smooth. And they love it. It would be even better if it was freeze dried raw.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great food! Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves it! I switched her to dehydrated food about 6 months ago and it’s made a great, positive impact on her life! She has more energy, and she looks forward to meal times. This brand is comparable to Honest Kitchen but I can get more for my money with Spot Farms and the ingredients are very similar.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We have a very picky eater as far as her food goes. I got a sampler pack from Amazon and when my dog ate the Spot Farms dinner I knew I had to get more. This has the chicken in it, makes up to a very nice gravy and my dog loves it. What more could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Miller

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this stuff and I know it's good for them.
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients are high quality, the business is family owned and its all grown and produced right here in the USA. Add that my dogs love this food and you can't get any better.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry A.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is adjusting very well. I’m so excited that I’m supporting a local business!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aliblank

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I switched from Honest Kitchen to Spot Farms. I eased into it like any other swapping of dog food, but after 3 weeks of constant Diarrhea, I am done. Going back to what works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Typical dehydrated, powdered food. Sometimes gets thicker than expected so I just add more water. The price is great for this type of food and my older frenchie prefers over dry kibble. My only complaint is the larger chunks of veggies in it - my dog does not like that!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great human-grade dog food.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff. I mix it with kibble. No tummy issues, and it's less expensive compared to other brands of quality dehydrated food.
customer_reviews.author: CWHKAE.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I make my own dog food and this is the perfect product. Love it thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Cline

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This dog food is awesome! My fur baby laps it up as soon as I finish stirring. I really appreciate that it is human grade without a bunch of additives!
customer_reviews.author: H. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not chunky!
customer_reviews.text: While my dog eats it (she eats almost anything) there are no chunks of meat or veggies that I can see like Honest Kitchen. Switched to this because of lower price but feel HK looks and smells better.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Very  cost effective
customer_reviews.text: The food is very cost effective compared to it's primary competitor. My dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Coyote Hunter

customer_reviews.title: We tried it
customer_reviews.text: Needed more kals for a hiking pupper. This fit the bill and I like the quality. We tasted a little and it’s just like unsalted chicken soup. Lightweight so we can carry more. Doggo loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Same quality as competitors but cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I love that I found an alternative that is on par with The Honest Kitchen but for less. My dog still enjoys it the same and I don’t feel I’m breaking the back each time I need it. So glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: jmags

customer_reviews.title: Pope Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is less than I had expected... I use another product called Honest Kitchen, which is a higher quality product,I love it and so do my dogs. Spot Farms costs less but the quality is far less
customer_reviews.author: Sandy TwoHearts

customer_reviews.title: No Go on this one
customer_reviews.text: Pups ate the first night. After that wouldn't go near it. These are the pickiest eaters I've ever had. On to try something new. ☹
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Good if dog likes pork
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with product just that 2 labs wouldn’t eat.... besides different flavor (pork instead of usual chicken) it had a slightly different texture.
customer_reviews.author: c ditzler

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, accident during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I absolutely love this food for my dog. I recommend it to everyone who asks. Its just unfortunate that the last box i ordered had a tear in it. It was crawling with ants and had to be thrown away. Is it possible to get a replacement box?
customer_reviews.author: Brittania

product_meta.title: Spot Farms Human Grade Dog Food, Natural Dehydrated Dog Food
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:8.0 lbAt Family Owned Spot Farms, we believe knowing where your dog’s food comes from is just as important as knowing what’s in it. That’s why we go right to the source, working closely with small family farmers across the USA. Our farmers raise their animals the right way, feeding them an all-vegetarian diet and never using antibiotics. Chock full healthy nutrients and probiotics our wholesome, human grade recipes are bursting with a flavor your dog will love. Mix up a delicious meal for your pup you can both feel good about! 

Directions: 
Spot Farms Grain Free Chicken recipe is formulated to meet the nutritional levels established by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles for all life stages, including the growth of large size dogs (70lbs or more as an adult). Dog Size Dry Cups/Day* Under 5 lbs 1/4 - 1/2 cup 5-15 lbs 1/2 - 1 cup 15-30 lbs 1 - 1 1/2 cups 30-50 lbs 1 1/2 - 2 1/4 cups 50-75 lbs 2 1/4 - 3 1/4 cups 75-100 lbs 3 1/4 - 4 cups * We suggest dividing the daily amount into two servings. Your individual dog's needs will vary with age and activity. For puppies serve up to 50% more than the amounts listed. For pregnant or nursing dogs you may feed up to 2-3 times listed amounts. For dogs over 100 lbs please add 1/4 cup for every 10lbs over 100lbs. Food that has been rehydrated, but not fed, may be refrigerated for up to 2 days.
feature_bullets: Grain Free: Dehydrated And Made With Probiotics For Easier Digestibility, This Healthy Dog Food Is Made In The Usa With No Antibiotics Ever Cage-Free Chicken Raised In North Carolina.
Human Grade: All Of The Ingredients Are Fit For Human Consumption And We Make Our Food To The Same Standards Required For Human Edible Food.
No Animal Meal: Only Real Meat. You Won’T Find Any Feed Grade Ingredients Like Chicken Meal, Lamb Meal Or Fish Meal Here.
All Natural: Spot Farms Dog Food Has No By-Products And No Artificial Flavors, Colors Or Preservatives. Just Add Water And Stir For A Delicious, Nutritious Meal.
Flexible Feeding: This Healthy Delicious Pet Food Can Be Fed As A Complete Diet, Or As A Topper Or Mix-In To Add Variety And Extra Nutrients To Your Pet'S Diet

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
